svg.title: Testcase for dynamic conditions
svg.script: function m() { var svgns = "http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"; var rect1 = document.getElementById("rect1"); rect1.setAttribute("systemLanguage", "foo"); var rect2 = document.getElementById("rect2"); rect2.setAttribute("requiredFeatures", "http://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/feature#Gradient"); var rect3 = document.getElementById("rect3"); rect3.setAttribute("requiredExtensions", "foo"); }
